publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-337 Linda Fabiani: Support for Trade Unions in South America—That the Parliament strongly supports SITRAP and associated Trade Unions in the banana producing countries of South America in their efforts to ensure workers rights, and condemns the anti-union actions taken by the multinational banana producers in Guatemala and Costa Rica. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Mr John Swinney*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-337 Support for Trade Unions in South America (lodged on 29 November 1999) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-337 Support for Trade Unions in South America (lodged on 29 November 1999) Colin Campbell*

S1M-337 Linda Fabiani: Support for Trade Unions in South America—That the Parliament strongly supports SITRAP and associated Trade Unions in the banana producing countries of South America in their efforts to ensure workers rights, and condemns the anti-union actions taken by the multinational banana producers in Guatemala and Costa Rica. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr John Swinney, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Colin Campbell
S1M-337 Support for Trade Unions in South America (lodged on 29 November 1999) Fiona McLeod*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-337 Support for Trade Unions in South America (lodged on 29 November 1999) Ms Sandra White*

S1M-337 Linda Fabiani: Support for Trade Unions in South America—That the Parliament strongly supports SITRAP and associated Trade Unions in the banana producing countries of South America in their efforts to ensure workers rights, and condemns the anti-union actions taken by the multinational banana producers in Guatemala and Costa Rica. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr John Swinney, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Colin Campbell, Fiona McLeod, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Sandra White
S1M-337 Support for Trade Unions in South America (lodged on 29 November 1999) Shona Robison*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-337 Support for Trade Unions in South America (lodged on 29 November 1999) Michael Matheson*
S1M-337 Support for Trade Unions in South America (lodged on 29 November 1999) Alex Neil*

S1M-337 Linda Fabiani: Support for Trade Unions in South America—That the Parliament strongly supports SITRAP and associated Trade Unions in the banana producing countries of South America in their efforts to ensure workers rights, and condemns the anti-union actions taken by the multinational banana producers in Guatemala and Costa Rica. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr John Swinney, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Colin Campbell, Fiona McLeod, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Sandra White, Shona Robison, Andrew Wilson, Michael Matheson, Alex Neil
S1M-337 Support for Trade Unions in South America (lodged on 29 November 1999) Ms Margo MacDonald*

S1M-337 Linda Fabiani: Support for Trade Unions in South America—That the Parliament strongly supports SITRAP and associated Trade Unions in the banana producing countries of South America in their efforts to ensure workers rights, and condemns the anti-union actions taken by the multinational banana producers in Guatemala and Costa Rica. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr John Swinney, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Colin Campbell, Fiona McLeod, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Sandra White, Shona Robison, Andrew Wilson, Michael Matheson, Alex Neil, Ms Margo MacDonald

S1M-337 Linda Fabiani: Support for Trade Unions in South America—That the Parliament strongly supports SITRAP and associated Trade Unions in the banana producing countries of South America in their efforts to ensure workers rights, and condemns the anti-union actions taken by the multinational banana producers in Guatemala and Costa Rica.
